name: Daedric Prey
description: Curse an enemy with a destructive rune, dealing 2904 Magic Damage to the target and 1335 Magic Damage to all other nearby enemies after 6 seconds.  While the curse is active, your pets deal an additional 20% damage to the target.  You can have only one Daedric Prey active at a time.
effectLines: Reduces the cost and your pets deal additional damage to the cursed target.
coefDescription: Curse an enemy with a destructive rune, dealing $1 Magic Damage to the target and $2 Magic Damage to all other nearby enemies after 6 seconds.  While the curse is active, your pets deal an additional 20% damage to the target.  You can have only one Daedric Prey active at a time.
